title: ANSC 215
intro: The objective of each section is to train students on industry evaluation techniques of animals and/or their by-products. Additionally, students will examine different industry production styles, selection for improvements, and end product marketability. This course is divided into sections that focus on evaluation of animals or animal by-products (meat or dairy) and will develop skills of basic evaluation associated with each section. Travel to production facilities may occur based on the section.
